remarks: If ` ( aleph `` A ) ` and ` ( aleph `` suc A ) ` are GCH-sets, then the successor aleph ` ( aleph `` suc A ) ` is equinumerous to the powerset of ` ( aleph `` A ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2015.)
statement: gchaleph2 $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ ( aleph ` A ) e. GCH /\ ( aleph ` suc A ) e. GCH ) -> ( aleph ` suc A ) ~~ ~P ( aleph ` A ) ) $.
